metadata.title: CVE-2018-13097 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in fs/f2fs/super.c in the Linux kernel through4.17.3. There is an out-of-bounds read or a divide-by-zero error for anincorrect user_block_count in a corrupted f2fs image, leading to a denialof service (BUG).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-13097` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-58-generic - 4.15.0-58.64
linux-image-4.15.0-58-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-58.64
linux-image-4.15.0-58-lowlatency - 4.15.0-58.64
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-58-generic - 4.15.0-58.64
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-58-lowlatency - 4.15.0-58.64
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1043-raspi2 - 4.15.0-1043.46
No subscription required
